##Question 2

1. 

Number of Individuals

    ```{bash}
    awk 'END { print NR }' /share/hw1/merge-geno.fam
    ```

Number of SNPS

    ```{bash}
    awk 'END { print NR }' /share/hw1/merge-geno.bim
    ```

2. 

Which Chromosomes Are Present and How Many SNPS in Each Chromosome
    ```{bash}
    awk  '{A[$1]++} END{for(i=1;i<24;i++)print i,A[i]}' /share/hw1/merge-geno.bim
    ```
    
3.

How Many SNPS Are Located Within MAP4 Gene
    ```{bash}
    awk '{if ($1 == 3 && $4 >= 47892180 && $4 <= 48130769) count++} END{print count}' /share/hw1/merge-geno.bim
    ```

4.

Print First 10 Lines Of Mendel SNP Definition File. Can Output to a File With > "Outfile".

    ```{bash}
    awk '{print $2,$1,$4} NR==10{exit}' OFS=',' /share/hw1/merge-geno.bim 
    ```

Print First 10 Lines Of Mendel Pedigree File. Can Output to a File With > "Outfile".

    ```{bash}
   awk '{gsub("T2DG", ""); if($5==1) $5="M"; if($5==2) $5="F"; print $1,$2,$3,$4,$5,""} NR==20{exit}' OFS=',' /share/hw1/merge-geno.fam
    ```
